level.heading: VACANCY IN THE OFFICE OF THE CHAIRPERSON (ยง 28-2806)

level.text: If a vacancy occurs in the office of the Chairperson, the Vice Chairperson shall assume the duties of the Chairperson and the Treasurer shall assume the duties of the Vice Chairperson until such time as new officers are elected.
If vacancies shall occur in elected offices, the Trust shall elect the officers to fill the unexpired terms.
